name: Haunted Bar
description:
It's your first night working at the H-Bar. 

Word has it the customers have been regulars for years. Maybe even decades?

And they are picky about their drinks.

Watch out for strange things happening while you work your shift. And keep the customers happy, or they may become…upset!

How to Play:

Left click and Right click to interact.

A Game By:

Khitty , Cholfy, and Brendan Finan

  • Game Dev: Khitty
  • Art: Cholfy 
  • Music: Brendan Finan
